title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Potato Creek State Park, Indiana
content:
Photo submitted by Greg Furry, “This is a vertical panorama from my first lap at Potato Creek State Park. The Northern Indiana Mountain Bike Association groomed the 7 mile trail for the first time this year.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Potato Creek State Park, Indiana appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
